checks.name: coverage-review
checks.prompt:
Check that calculator code changes have corresponding test coverage, especially edge cases (zero, negative numbers, large values).

Respond with exactly one of:
- PASS (on a line by itself)
- FAIL: <reason> (on a line by itself)

{{session_diffs}}

checks.name: commit-review
checks.prompt:
Review staged changes to the calculator module for:
1. Division by zero handling
2. Integer overflow edge cases
3. Missing test coverage for error paths

Respond with exactly one of:
- PASS (on a line by itself)
- FAIL: <reason> (on a line by itself)

{{staged_diff}}

checks.name: adversarial-review
checks.prompt:
Review staged changes to the calculator module as a second opinion. Look for issues the primary reviewer might miss:
1. Subtle logic errors or off-by-one mistakes
2. Unsafe type coercion or NaN propagation
3. Missing boundary conditions in tests

{{staged_diff}}
